channel.title: Music Industry on Luca Rossi
channel.description: Recent content in Music Industry on Luca Rossi

item.title: From Courtrooms to Charts: the Impact of Kavanaugh's Appointment on Music Consumption
item.description: This study examines the impact of Brett Kavanaugh's Supreme Court appointment on U.S. music consumption, specifically exploring changes in streaming patterns on Spotify.

item.title: Country Music: Strategic Incentives of Competing Voters
item.description: We analyze the strategic proofness of positional voting systems using Eurovision Song Contest data. Our findings reveal strategic voting behaviors, particularly among jury members, influenced by semifinal stage information rather than song quality, suggesting strategic considerations drive voter choices.
